subject: JUnit in a UML case tool
msgSnippet: Hello, We often use the JUnit framework in our Java projects and decided to integrate it into our UML Case Tool. The particularity of our work is to generate a
messageBody:
Hello,

We often use the JUnit framework in our Java projects and decided to
integrate it into our UML Case Tool.

The particularity of our work is to generate a test model from the
application model and then to modelize the test methods using UML sequence
diagrams. Then the code is automatically generated and executed in the JUnit
framework!

The following article describes our original way to integrate JUnit in
Objecteering and it would be very interesting for me to get your opinion on
it.

Best regards,

Eric RIOU
